thread.title: Football: Former Stars defender Gundi passes on
thread.title_full: Football: Former Stars defender Gundi passes on

title: Football: Former Stars defender Gundi passes on
text:
Former Harambee Stars defender, Simon Gundi, who died on February 22, 2017. [PHOTO: STANDARD] 
The Kenyan football fraternity is mourning the death of former international footballer Simon Gundi. 
Close family members confirmed Gundi died on Wednesday at his Mtwapa home after a short illness. 
Gundi enjoyed a successful stint as a defender with Kenya national soccer team Harambee Stars and Kenya Breweries later known as Tusker. He played for Harambee Stars under the tutelage of the late coach Jonathan Niva. 
Gundiâ€™s demise comes barely five months after the death of legendary international goalkeeper and coach James Sianga. Gundi hailed from Rabai in Coast Region.
